text: Your Desire Is Sin (German: Dein Begehren ist Sünde ...) is a 1925 German silent drama film directed by Franz Seitz and starring Maria Mindzenty, Otto Framer and John Mylong.Caneppele p.343 The film's sets were designed by the art director Max Heilbronn. It was shot at the Emelka Studios in Munich. ==Cast== * Maria Mindzenty as Schwester Beate * Otto Framer as Henrik Kellquist * John Mylong as Felix Dubois * Ferdinand Martini as Dr. Moebius * Georg H. Schnell * Max Weydner ==References== ==Bibliography== * Paolo Caneppele. Entscheidungen der Wiener Filmzensur: 1922-1925. Filmarchiv Austria, 2002. ==External links== * Category:1925 films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:Films directed by Franz Seitz Category:German silent feature films Category:Films shot at Bavaria Studios Category:Bavaria Film films Category:1925 drama films Category:German drama films
title: Your Desire Is Sin
